enhanced_by.reason: The getHostAddress method relies on the state of the InetAddress obtained from the getAddress method.
The getHostAddress method checks if the address is IPv6 using the isIPv6 method to determine if it needs to strip the scope ID.

Both getHostAddress and getRedactedAddress methods return a string representation of the host address, making assertions about the output of getHostAddress easier to construct by comparing it to the output of getRedactedAddress.

The toString method also constructs a string representation of the address, which can be used to verify the correctness of the getHostAddress method by comparing the host address part of the toString output.
